name: Primary (HangryHippy)
description:
A walking sim. For best results, play at least 10-20 min.

I was inspired by the placate architecture of my hometown. Primary is an experimental view of this.

Controls

Arrow Keys- Movement

Spacebar- Literally nothing

Let me know what you think!

In-browser version: https://hangryhippy.itch.io/primary-for-browser
